metadata.description: Report used to calculate employees payable salaries every month.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A list of staff with monthly salary payable for.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The current salary for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The person currently filling this position.

configuration.name: display_name
configuration.value: The Monthly Salary Payable to Person

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Work contact details for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The position held by this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The facility where this position works.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The county where the facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where the facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The division where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The job associated with this position.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The age range for the person

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: CASE WHEN `demographic+birth_date` IS NULL THEN '?' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 17 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '-18' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 23 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '18-23' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 29 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '24-29' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 34 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '30-34' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 39 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '35-39' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 44 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '40-44' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 49 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '45-49' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 54 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '50-54' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 59 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '55-59' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 64 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '60-64' ELSE '65+' END

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The person's duration in their current position.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: IF( MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`primary_form+start_date`) < 0, CONCAT( YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(`primary_form+start_date`) - 1, ' year(s) ', 12 + MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`primary_form+start_date`), ' month(s)'), CONCAT(YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(`primary_form+start_date`), ' year(s) ', MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`primary_form+start_date`), ' month(s)'))

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: IF( MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`+currentduration`) < 0, YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(`+currentduration`) - 1, YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(`+currentduration`) )

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The start date for this person in their current district. There will be an issue if the facility they're in isn't linked to a district.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: IF( MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`+district_start_date`) < 0, YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(`+district_start_date`) - 1, YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(`+district_start_date`) )

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The duration of the person in their current district.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: IF( MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`+district_start_date`) < 0, CONCAT( YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(`+district_start_date`) - 1, ' year(s) ', 12 + MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`+district_start_date`), ' month(s)'), CONCAT(YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(`+district_start_date`), ' year(s) ', MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`+district_start_date`), ' month(s)'))

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The county where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The year the person started in this position.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The date of initial entry for this record.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT MIN(date) FROM entry WHERE form_field = 258 AND change_type = 1 AND record = SUBSTRING(`person+id`,8))

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The date of initial entry in date format.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: List of Staff with payable monthly salary

configurationGroup.name: person_monthly_salary_payable+monthly_net_salary
configurationGroup.displayName: Person Monthly Salary Payable Monthly Net Salary

configurationGroup.name: person_monthly_salary_payable+working_days
configurationGroup.displayName: Person Monthly Salary Payable Working Days
